secondary_street_name: Kenninghall Road, Rendlesham Road and Muir Road
description: Erection of a part 2, part 3 and part 4-storey terrace together with blocks ranging between 4- to 6-storeys in height to provide 98 residential units (14 houses and 84 flats), comprising 47 x 1 bed; 35 x 2 bed; 8 x 3 bed; 4 x 4 bed and 4 x 5 bed units together with 3 retail units and pump station (Phase 3).
